en: Narrator: George's favourite toy is Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：乔治最喜欢的玩具是恐龙先生。

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Narrator: George loves Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：乔治非常喜欢恐龙先生。

en: George: Grr.
cn: 乔治：嗷呜。

en: Narrator: Sometimes, George likes to scare Peppa with Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：有时候，乔治喜欢用恐龙先生吓佩奇。

sentence.en: George likes to scare Peppa with Mr Dinosaur.
sentence.cn: 乔治喜欢用恐龙先生吓佩奇。

examples.en: George likes to scare Peppa with his snake toy.
examples.cn: 乔治喜欢用他的蛇玩具吓佩奇。

examples.en: George likes to scare Peppa with his robot.
examples.cn: 乔治喜欢用他的机器人吓佩奇。

en: George: Grr.
cn: 乔治：嗷呜。

en: Peppa Pig: Eeek! Too scary.
cn: 佩奇：哎呀！太吓人了。

en: Narrator: At suppertime, Mr Dinosaur sits next to George.
cn: 旁白：晚饭时间，恐龙先生坐在乔治旁边。

en: Mummy Pig: I beg your pardon.
cn: 猪妈妈：你说什么？

en: Mummy Pig: Was that you George, or was it Mr Dinosaur?
cn: 猪妈妈：那是你吗，乔治，还是恐龙先生？

sentence.en: Was that you George, or was it Mr Dinosaur?
sentence.cn: 那是你吗，乔治，还是恐龙先生？

examples.en: Was that you, or was it the wind?
Was that you, or was it the music?

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Narrator: At bath time, George shares his bath with Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：洗澡时，乔治和恐龙先生一起洗澡。

examples.en: At dinner time
At bedtime

en: George: Grr.
cn: 乔治：嗷呜。

en: Mummy Pig: Good night, Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：晚安，佩奇。

en: Peppa Pig: Good night, Mummy.
cn: 佩奇：晚安，妈妈。

en: Mummy Pig: Good night, George.
cn: 猪妈妈：晚安，乔治。

en: Mummy Pig: And good night, Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 猪妈妈：也晚安，恐龙先生。

en: George: Grr.
cn: 乔治：嗷呜。

en: Narrator: When George goes to bed, Mr. Dinosaur is tucked up with him.
cn: 旁白：乔治睡觉时，恐龙先生也和他一起盖在被子里。

en: Narrator: George's favourite game is throwing Mr. Dinosaur up in the air...
cn: 旁白：乔治最喜欢的游戏是把恐龙先生抛到空中……

points.en: throwing Mr. Dinosaur up in the air

en: George: Whee!
cn: 乔治：咻——！

en: Narrator: ...and catching him when he falls back down.
cn: 旁白：……然后在恐龙先生落下来时接住他。

en: George: Whee!
cn: 乔治：咻——！

en: Narrator: Peppa and Daddy Pig are playing draughts.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和猪爸爸在下跳棋。

en: Peppa Pig: I win, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：我赢了，爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh. Well done, Peppa.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，做得好，佩奇。

en: George: Whhhhaaaaaaaaaaa.
cn: 乔治：哇啊啊啊啊啊。

en: Daddy Pig: George?
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治？

en: George: Whaaaaaaaaa.
cn: 乔治：哇啊啊啊。

en: Mummy Pig: George, what's the matter?
cn: 猪妈妈：乔治，怎么了？

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Daddy Pig: George, have you lost Mr Dinosaur?
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，你把恐龙先生弄丢了吗？

sentence.cn: 你把恐龙先生弄丢了吗？

examples.en: have you lost your toy?
have you lost your ball?

en: Narrator: George has lost Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：乔治把恐龙先生弄丢了。

en: Mummy Pig: Don't worry George. We'll find Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 猪妈妈：别担心，乔治。我们会找到恐龙先生的。

en: Daddy Pig: It's a job for a detective.
cn: 猪爸爸：这是侦探的工作。

sentence.en: It's a job for a detective.

examples.en: It's a job for a doctor.
It's a job for a teacher.

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, what is a detective?
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，什么是侦探？

en: Daddy Pig: A detective is a very important person who is good at finding things.
cn: 猪爸爸：侦探是很擅长找东西的重要人物。

sentence.en: A detective is a very important person who is good at finding things.
sentence.cn: 侦探是很擅长找东西的重要人物。

examples.en: A doctor is a very important person who is good at helping people.
examples.cn: 医生是很擅长帮助人的重要人物。

examples.en: A teacher is a very important person who is good at teaching children.
examples.cn: 老师是很擅长教孩子们的一个重要人物。

en: Peppa Pig: Me! Me! I'm good at finding things.
cn: 佩奇：我！我！我很会找东西。

en: Daddy Pig: All right. Peppa is the detective.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，佩奇就是侦探。

en: Peppa Pig: George. I am the detective. I will help you find Mr Dinosaur.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，我是侦探。我会帮你找恐龙先生。

sentence.en: I will help you find Mr Dinosaur.

examples.en: I will help you find your toy.
I will help you find your book.

en: Mummy Pig: Maybe the detective should ask George some simple questions.
cn: 猪妈妈：也许侦探应该问乔治一些简单的问题。

en: Peppa Pig: George? Where's Mr Dinosaur?
cn: 佩奇：乔治？恐龙先生在哪里？

en: George: Whaaaaaaaaaa.
cn: 乔治：哇啊啊啊。

en: Narrator: George does not know where Mr Dinosaur is.
cn: 旁白：乔治不知道恐龙先生在哪里。

sentence.en: George does not know where Mr Dinosaur is.
sentence.cn: 乔治不知道恐龙先生在哪里。

examples.en: George does not know where his bike is.
examples.cn: 乔治不知道他的自行车在哪里。

examples.en: George does not know where his ball is.
examples.cn: 乔治不知道他的球在哪里。

en: Daddy Pig: The detective could try and guess where Mr Dinosaur might be.
cn: 猪爸爸：侦探可以试着猜猜恐龙先生可能在哪里。

sentence.en: The detective could try and guess where Mr Dinosaur might be.
sentence.cn: 侦探可以试着猜猜恐龙先生可能在哪里。

examples.en: The boy could try and guess where his toy might be.
examples.cn: 男孩可以试着猜猜他的玩具可能在哪里。

examples.en: The farmer could try and guess where his sheep might be.
examples.cn: 农夫可以试着猜猜他的羊可能在哪里。

en: Peppa Pig: I know. I know where he is.
cn: 佩奇：我知道，我知道他在哪里。

en: Peppa Pig: George always has Mr Dinosaur with him in the bath.
cn: 佩奇：乔治洗澡时总是带着恐龙先生。

sentence.en: George always has Mr Dinosaur with him in the bath.
sentence.cn: 乔治洗澡时总是带着恐龙先生。

examples.en: George always has his toy with him in the bath.
examples.cn: 乔治洗澡时总是带着他的玩具。

examples.en: George always has his book with him in the bath.
examples.cn: 乔治洗澡时总是带着他的书。

en: Peppa Pig: So Mr Dinosaur is in the bath.
cn: 佩奇：所以恐龙先生在浴缸里。

en: Narrator: Mr Dinosaur is not in the bath.
cn: 旁白：恐龙先生不在浴缸里。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh. I know. I know where Mr Dinosaur is.
cn: 佩奇：哦，我知道，我知道恐龙先生在哪里。

en: Peppa Pig: George always has Mr Dinosaur in his bed at night.
cn: 佩奇：乔治晚上睡觉时总是带着恐龙先生。

en: Peppa Pig: So that's where he is.
cn: 佩奇：所以他在那里。

examples.en: So that's where my cup is.
So that's where my backpack is.

en: Narrator: Mr Dinosaur is not in George's bed.
cn: 旁白：恐龙先生不在乔治的床上。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh.
cn: 佩奇：哦。

en: Mummy Pig: Maybe we should try the garden.
cn: 猪妈妈：也许我们应该去花园找找。

sentence.en: Maybe we should try the garden.
sentence.cn: 也许我们应该去花园找找。

examples.en: Maybe we should try the park.
examples.cn: 也许我们应该去公园找找。

examples.en: Maybe we should try the kitchen.
examples.cn: 也许我们应该去厨房找找。

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, the garden. I was going to say that.
cn: 佩奇：对，花园。我正要说呢。

points.en: I was going to say that

en: Peppa Pig: Where is Mr Dinosaur?
cn: 佩奇：恐龙先生在哪里？

en: Narrator: Mr Dinosaur is very hard to find.
cn: 旁白：恐龙先生很难找。

sentence.en: Mr Dinosaur is very hard to find.

examples.en: My notebook is very hard to find.
The keys are very hard to find.

en: Peppa Pig: Oh. Mr Dinosaur isn't anywhere.
cn: 佩奇：哦，恐龙先生哪儿都没有。

examples.en: Your telephone isn't anywhere.
My car isn't anywhere.

en: Daddy Pig: George? You do love to throw Mr Dinosaur in the air.
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，你确实喜欢把恐龙先生抛到空中。

sentence.en: You do love to throw Mr Dinosaur in the air.
sentence.cn: 你确实喜欢把恐龙先生抛到空中。

examples.en: You do love to throw your ball in the air.
examples.cn: 你确实喜欢把球抛到空中。

examples.en: You do love to throw your frisbee in the air.
examples.cn: 你确实喜欢把飞盘抛到空中。

en: Daddy Pig: I wonder if this time you threw Mr Dinosaur just a bit too high.
cn: 猪爸爸：我想这次你是不是扔得太高了。

en: Peppa Pig: There he is. There he is. I saw him first.
cn: 佩奇：他在那里！他在那里！我第一个看到的。

en: Daddy Pig: Well done, Peppa.
cn: 猪爸爸：做得好，佩奇。

en: Daddy Pig: You really are a very good detective.
cn: 猪爸爸：你真是个很棒的侦探。

sentence.en: You really are a very good detective.

examples.en: You really are a very good teacher.
You really are a very good cook.

en: George: Dinosaur. Grr.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。嗷呜。

en: Narrator: George is so happy to have Mr Dinosaur back again.
cn: 旁白：乔治又找回了恐龙先生，非常开心。

sentence.en: George is so happy to have Mr Dinosaur back again.
sentence.cn: 乔治又找回了恐龙先生，非常开心。

examples.en: I am so happy to see you again.
She is so happy to win the game.

en: George: Whee.
cn: 乔治：咻——。

en: Daddy Pig: Maybe it isn't a good idea to play with dinosaurs near trees.
cn: 猪爸爸：也许在树旁边玩恐龙不是个好主意。

sentence.en: Maybe it isn't a good idea to play with dinosaurs near trees.
sentence.cn: 也许在树旁边玩恐龙不是个好主意。

examples.en: Maybe it isn't a good idea to play with toys near water.
examples.cn: 也许在水边玩玩具不是个好主意。

examples.en: Maybe it isn't a good idea to play with food.
examples.cn: 也许玩食物不是个好主意。

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。
